translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほう、こういうのもあるのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, so there are things like this too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 壁には数枚の油絵が飾られていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several oil paintings were hung on the wall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それらはどれも柔らかいタッチで描かれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Each of them was painted with a soft touch,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこか温かみを感じるものだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: giving a certain feeling of warmth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、芸術はよく分からんが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, I don't really understand art,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心が穏やかになりそうな絵だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but these paintings seem like they would calm the heart."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは私の描いた絵だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Those paintings were drawn by me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんと！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「似合わないのは自覚している」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I am aware that it's not very fitting."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「似合う、似合わないというか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not so much fitting or not fitting..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、上手いな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-You’re skilled..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ありがとう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thank you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「意外に思うだろうが絵画が趣味でな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You might find it surprising, but painting is my hobby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見るのも、描くのも」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I enjoy both looking at and creating art."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「意外だ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is unexpected..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみにどれがお気に入りなんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the way, which one is your favorite?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだな、飾っているくらいだから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, since they are all displayed here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここにあるのはどれも気に入っているが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I like all of them... but if I have to choose,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 強いて上げればこれか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: this one maybe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アミトスが指さした絵は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The painting Amitos pointed to

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 子供達が森の中で遊んでいるという
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: depicted children playing in a forest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 緑が目にも優しいほのぼのとした絵だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a heartwarming picture with gentle greens easy on the eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……随分、こう、優しい絵だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It's quite a kind, gentle painting."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだろうか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do you think so?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アミトスには似合わない絵だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's a painting that doesn't suit Amitos."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「似合わないだろうな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, it probably doesn't suit you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もしかして、軍人やってなければ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Could it be that if you weren't a soldier,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今とかなり性格違ったんじゃないか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: your personality would be quite different now?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「穏やかで、優しくて、世話焼きな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Calm, kind, and caring..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな女性になってた……ような気がする」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel like you'd have become that kind of woman."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっ、そうかも知れないな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh, maybe that's true."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「子供の頃の夢は学校の先生だった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "My childhood dream was to be a school teacher."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その夢を叶え……誰かと結婚をして……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To make that dream come true... marry someone...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 子供をもうけて……穏やかな生活を……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have children... and lead a peaceful life..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな私もいたかも知れない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Maybe there was a version of me like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意味のない空想だが興味はある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s a meaningless daydream, but I'm interested."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もったいないような……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It feels like a waste...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままでもいいような……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But maybe it's fine just the way it is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいに決まってる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It definitely is."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここに至るまでの道のりに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "On the path that led me here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選択の余地がない局面は多々あったが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there were many situations with no options...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを歩むと決めたのは私の意思だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the decision to walk that path was my own will."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そこに後悔などあってたまるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There’s no way I’d have any regrets about that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そんなもんか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I guess that's the way it is."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「実際、戦いばかりの生活だが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In reality, my life is full of battles...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰かを守る為の今の生活は、満足してるよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I’m satisfied with this life of protecting someone."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう呟くアミトスの顔は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amitos muttered this with

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこか優しい表情をしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a somewhat gentle expression on her face.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もったいないような……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It feels like a waste...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままでもいいような……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But maybe it's fine just the way it is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいに決まってる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It definitely is."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここに至るまでの道のりに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "On the path that led me here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選択の余地がない局面は多々あったが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there were many situations with no options...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを歩むと決めたのは私の意思だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the decision to walk that path was my own will."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そこに後悔などあってたまるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There’s no way I’d have any regrets about that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そんなもんか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I guess that's the way it is."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「実際、戦いばかりの生活だが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In reality, my life is full of battles...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰かを守る為の今の生活は、満足してるよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I’m satisfied with this life of protecting someone."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう呟くアミトスの顔は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amitos muttered this with

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこか優しい表情をしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a somewhat gentle expression on her face.
